page.title: 04AMENITIES DUNLOP
page.content: IN DUNLOP THERE ARE 4 FOOD SHOPS.THREE SELL SWEETS, TINNED FOOD AND DRINKS,ANOTHER SELLS CHINESE FOOD. DUNLOP ALSO HAS A HAIRDRESSER AND A NEWSAGENT.AFTER FIFTY YEARS THE POST OFFICE HAS JUST BEEN MOVED DOWN TO BECOME PART OF ONE OF THE FOOD SHOPS. DUNLOP BANK WAS BUILT IN 1872 113 YEARS AGO.THE PRESENT MANAGER HAS BEEN WORKING IN THE BANK FOR 4 MONTHS.IT'S THE CLYDESDALE BANK BUT HASN'T ALWAYS BEEN, AT ONE TIME IT WAS A BRANCH OF THE NORTH OF SCOTLAND BANK. THERE ARE 4 STAFF AT THE BANK AND THEY WORK FROM 9.00 AM TO 5.00 PM WHILE THE MANAGER WORKS FROM 9.00 AM TO 6.00 PM.MONDAY AND THURSDAY ARE THE BUSIEST DAYS OF THE WEEK. THIS IS BECAUSE IF A LETTER WAS POSTED ON FRIDAY IT WOULD ARRIVE ON MONDAY. DUNLOP HAS A BIG BANK BECAUSE FARMERS AND HOWIES BANK LOCALLY.
